verses.verse: My son, <S%H1121><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> not my law; <S%H8451><s%> but let your heart <S%H3820><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> my commandments: <S%H4687><s%>
For length <S%H753><s%> of days, <S%H3117><s%> and long <S%H753><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> and peace, <S%H7965><s%> shall they add <S%H3254><s%> to you.

Let not mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> you: bind <S%H7194><s%> them about <S%H5921><s%> your neck; <S%H1621><s%> write <S%H3789><s%> them on the table <S%H3871><s%> of your heart: <S%H3820><s%>
So shall you find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> understanding <S%H7922><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and man. <S%H120><s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart; <S%H3820><s%> and lean <S%H8172><s%> not to your own understanding. <S%H998><s%>
In all <S%H3605><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> him, and he shall direct <S%H3474><s%> your paths. <S%H734><s%>
Be not wise <S%H2450><s%> in your own eyes: <S%H5869><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil. <S%H7451><s%>
It shall be health <S%H7500><s%> to your navel, <S%H8270><s%> and marrow <S%H8250><s%> to your bones. <S%H6106><s%>
Honor <S%H3513><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> with your substance, <S%H1952><s%> and with the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your increase: <S%H8393><s%>
So shall your barns <S%H618><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with plenty, <S%H7647><s%> and your presses <S%H3342><s%> shall burst <S%H6555><s%> out with new <S%H8492><s%> wine. <S%H8492><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> despise <S%H3988><s%> not the chastening <S%H4148><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be weary <S%H6973><s%> of his correction: <S%H8433><s%>
For whom <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> he corrects; <S%H3198><s%> even as a father <S%H1><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> in whom he delights. <S%H7521><s%>
Happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> that finds <S%H4672><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> and the man <S%H120><s%> that gets <S%H6329><s%> understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
For the merchandise <S%H5504><s%> of it is better <S%H2896><s%> than the merchandise <S%H5505><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and the gain <S%H8393><s%> thereof than fine gold. <S%H2742><s%>
She is more precious <S%H3368><s%> than rubies: <S%H6443><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the things you can desire <S%H2656><s%> are not to be compared <S%H7737><s%> to her.
Length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> is in her right <S%H3225><s%> hand; <S%H3225><s%> and in her left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor. <S%H3519><s%>
Her ways <S%H1870><s%> are ways <S%H1870><s%> of pleasantness, <S%H5278><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> her paths <S%H5410><s%> are peace. <S%H7965><s%>
She is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> to them that lay hold <S%H2388><s%> on her: and happy <S%H833><s%> is every one that retains <S%H8551><s%> her.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> has founded <S%H3245><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> by understanding <S%H8394><s%> has he established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
By his knowledge <S%H1847><s%> the depths <S%H8415><s%> are broken <S%H1234><s%> up, and the clouds <S%H7834><s%> drop <S%H7491><s%> down <S%H7491><s%> the dew. <S%H2919><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> let not them depart <S%H3868><s%> from your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> sound <S%H8454><s%> wisdom <S%H8454><s%> and discretion: <S%H4209><s%>
So shall they be life <S%H2416><s%> to your soul, <S%H5315><s%> and grace <S%H2580><s%> to your neck. <S%H1621><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> shall you walk <S%H3212><s%> in your way <S%H1870><s%> safely, <S%H983><s%> and your foot <S%H7272><s%> shall not stumble. <S%H5062><s%>

When <S%H518><s%> you lie <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> you shall not be afraid: <S%H6342><s%> yes, you shall lie <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> and your sleep <S%H8142><s%> shall be sweet. <S%H6149><s%>
Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of sudden <S%H6597><s%> fear, <S%H6343><s%> neither of the desolation <S%H7722><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it comes. <S%H935><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be your confidence, <S%H3689><s%> and shall keep <S%H8104><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> from being taken. <S%H3921><s%>
Withhold <S%H4513><s%> not good <S%H2896><s%> from them to whom it is due, <S%H1167><s%> when it is in the power <S%H410><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it.

Say <S%H559><s%> not to your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> Go, <S%H3212><s%> and come <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and to morrow <S%H4279><s%> I will give; <S%H5414><s%> when you have <S%H3426><s%> it by you.
Devise <S%H2790><s%> not evil <S%H7451><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> seeing he dwells <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> by you.
Strive <S%H7378><s%> not with a man <S%H120><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause, <S%H2600><s%> if <S%H518><s%> he have done <S%H1580><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> harm. <S%H7451><s%>
Envy <S%H7065><s%> you not the oppressor, <S%H376><s%> <S%H2555><s%> and choose <S%H977><s%> none <S%H408><s%> of his ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For the fraudulent <S%H3868><s%> is abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but his secret <S%H5475><s%> is with the righteous. <S%H3477><s%>
The curse <S%H3994><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked: <S%H7563><s%> but he blesses <S%H1288><s%> the habitation <S%H5116><s%> of the just. <S%H6662><s%>
Surely <S%H518><s%> he scorns <S%H3887><s%> the scorners: <S%H3887><s%> but he gives <S%H5414><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> to the lowly. <S%H6041><s%>
The wise <S%H2450><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> glory: <S%H3519><s%> but shame <S%H7036><s%> shall be the promotion <S%H7311><s%> of fools. <S%H3684><s%>
